title: Design of Blended Mathematics Learning Courses Based on Remote Education Quality Management

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational math concepts and experience applying them to tasks
context.additional_context: Necessity of introducing content design and quality management processes optimized for smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy in a blended learning environment
Learners can engage in self-directed learning at least twice weekly using interactive content provided on mobile devices
Learners can improve learning outcomes by over 90% according to quality management standards provided through feedback systems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
